item.title: Learn `sed` and be happy
item.description: When you’re done reading this article, you’ll be ready to become a sed expert. Yes, you read it right – So let’s hit the ground running. What is sed? Ever wanted to edit a file without having to open it in a text editor? Or maybe you want to modify several files and don’t want to do it manually? With sed, you just issue a short command in the terminal and bam!
